title: Hacker/Scammer around most likely
body: My friend logged on to League of Legends and got hacked say "someone else has logged into your account." So he changed his password. And if this happens to you, might wana check your friends list cause you might send a link saying "1350 Rp! Enjoooyyy" or so. Beware if this happens to you change your password!!!!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: That sounds like a scary situation and am sorry it happened to your friend!  Hopefully everything is okay now, but offer him our [account protection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)guide just to make sure his info is safe in and outside of League.  Thanks for the report!
